name: WreckRace Reloaded | VR Racing Shooter
description:
This Tech Demo is the 3rd Iteration of my first ever VR game. Race around a track, go through mountains, come out the other side and take on massive jumps as you speed through checkpoints.

Gamewebsite: https://sites.google.com/view/wreckracereloaded/home

Trello Board: https://trello.com/b/lHUgUHRn/wreckracereloadedvr2021

Currently made to play on Rift or Quest, I'll be adding other platforms soon. Leave a comment with your platform and I'll priortise it.

Cannons will shoot at you as you move around the track, the final score is a combination of checkpoint times (vs a target time per checkpoint) + damage dealt to Cannons - damage taken to the car.

Possible scores +90 to -90 for checkpoint times over 9 checkpoints | +100 for damage to Cannons, each cannon has 4 damage tiers each with +5 points | -100 points for damage to car, 0 points until 30 damage, then 30 points at damage tier 1, +30 at damage tier 2 (60 points damage), +30 tier 3 and +10 tier 4 (full damage at 100 points damage).

All feedback will help me to improve this game as I move to include new tracks and things like a steering wheel you can turn in VR. At the moment steering is either via grab and placing your hand on the steering wheel, or via the analogue stick on the controller. 

Feedback form here:

I have recently upgraded to the new Action Based Unity Input System, this will let me hook up other VR Hardware types and also a steering wheel (I have a Logitech G25 to test with).
